content.html:
Your plugin seems to work for most people, though I have encountered  problem while testing it on my blog. I can't access any article in IE 7, I just see a blank page.
I am running a K2 derivative, http://www.obharath.net/blog/2006/12/17/3-column-k2-093/, on WordPress 2.1.2. I have disabled AJAX commenting but it didn't work either.
Do you have any idea what might be the problem?

Thanks
Carsten
